formulas.name: outputIntegrations
formulas.expression:
IF(AND({!EcomIntegration}=True,{!PosIntegration}=True,{!AdyenForPlatforms}=True,{!FranchiseQSR}=True),"Ecom Integration;POS Integration;Adyen for Platforms;Franchise / QSR",
IF(AND({!EcomIntegration}=True,{!PosIntegration}=True,{!AdyenForPlatforms}=True,{!FranchiseQSR}=False),"Ecom Integration;POS Integration;Adyen for Platforms",
IF(AND({!EcomIntegration}=True,{!PosIntegration}=True,{!AdyenForPlatforms}=False,{!FranchiseQSR}=True),"Ecom Integration;POS Integration;Franchise / QSR",
IF(AND({!EcomIntegration}=True,{!PosIntegration}=True,{!AdyenForPlatforms}=False,{!FranchiseQSR}=False),"Ecom Integration;POS Integration",
IF(AND({!EcomIntegration}=True,{!PosIntegration}=False,{!AdyenForPlatforms}=True,{!FranchiseQSR}=False),"Ecom Integration;Adyen for Platforms",
IF(AND({!EcomIntegration}=True,{!PosIntegration}=False,{!AdyenForPlatforms}=False,{!FranchiseQSR}=True),"Ecom Integration;Franchise / QSR",
IF(AND({!EcomIntegration}=True,{!PosIntegration}=False,{!AdyenForPlatforms}=False,{!FranchiseQSR}=False),"Ecom Integration",
IF(AND({!EcomIntegration}=False,{!PosIntegration}=True,{!AdyenForPlatforms}=True,{!FranchiseQSR}=False),"POS Integration;Adyen for Platforms",
IF(AND({!EcomIntegration}=False,{!PosIntegration}=True,{!AdyenForPlatforms}=False,{!FranchiseQSR}=True),"POS Integration;Franchise / QSR",
IF(AND({!EcomIntegration}=False,{!PosIntegration}=True,{!AdyenForPlatforms}=False,{!FranchiseQSR}=False),"POS Integration",
IF(AND({!EcomIntegration}=False,{!PosIntegration}=False,{!AdyenForPlatforms}=True,{!FranchiseQSR}=True),"Adyen for Platforms;Franchise / QSR",
IF(AND({!EcomIntegration}=False,{!PosIntegration}=False,{!AdyenForPlatforms}=True,{!FranchiseQSR}=False),"Adyen for Platforms",
IF(AND({!EcomIntegration}=False,{!PosIntegration}=False,{!AdyenForPlatforms}=False,{!FranchiseQSR}=True),"Franchise / QSR","")))))))))))))

fields.name: disErrorText
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong during this process due to the following error:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


Please retry if you understand what goes wrong, otherwise reach out to your System Administrator.

validationRule.errorMessage: ï»¿Please select at least one of the two options to proceed.

fields.name: AddendumForPosServicesSigned
fields.fieldText: Addendum for IPP Services already signed?

fields.name: AssignedIm
fields.helpText: Name of the IM that has been requested for help.

fields.name: AssignedOnboardingSpecialist
fields.helpText: Name of the Onboarding Specialist that has been requested for help.

fields.name: displUpdateStatusToRequested
fields.fieldText: ï»¿After clicking the next button, the status will be updated to Resources Requested and the Support Request will be assigned to the IM/POM/Onboarding queue, awaiting assignment of an IM, POM and/or Onboarding Specialist

fields.name: displUpdateStatusToAssigned
fields.fieldText: After clicking the next button, the status will be updated to Resources Assigned and a notification will be sent to the assigned IM, POM and/or Onboarding Specialist.
